column2: my favorite art museum I've ever been to. This beats out the Getty LA. If Impressionism is up your alley
column3: you will fall in love with this place. Remember all the art pieces that you've studied in your art classes? They've got them! Seurat
column7: Georgia O'Keefe. This is a must see venue if your ever exploring Chicago. I would recommend that you do pay for the $1 per item to check in because you end up spending 3+ hours at this museum and it would be torturous to have to lug your hefty jacket around the whole time (if you're visiting during the winter). Admission is about $20 per person. I would definitely come back here if I visited Chicago again!
